document_data.name: Slicing Shadow
document_data.mainbody: '''''Slicing shadow''''' was a [[divine]] [[evocation]] [[spell]] that conjured a cloud of harmful smoke and darkness.
document_data.Effects:
When this spell was cast, a [[cleric]] created a stationary cloud of shadowy smoke. Within the cloud were a number of black tendrils of darkness that lashed out at any nearby persons or creatures.

The caster could end the spell prematurely if they wished.
document_data.History: This spell appeared upon the inside of the ''[[Mask of Mysteries]]'' when the proper actions were taken by its wearer.
document_data.Components: This spell required [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s in order to be cast.
